top_stories.title: Ex-Googlers are building infrastructure to help companies understand their video data
top_stories.description: Founded by former Google Japan leaders, InfiniMind is building enterprise AI to turn vast, unused video archives into searchable, actionable business intelligence.
top_stories.author: Kate Park
top_stories.content: Founded by former Google Japan leaders, InfiniMind is building enterprise AI to turn vast, unused video archives into searchable, actionable business intelligence.

top_stories.title: Scaling content review operations with multi-agent workflow
top_stories.description: The agent-based approach we present is applicable to any type of enterprise content, from product documentation and knowledge bases to marketing materials and technical specifications. To demonstrate these concepts in action, we walk through a practical example of reviewing blog content for technical accuracy. These patterns and techniques can be directly adapted to various content review needs by adjusting the agent configurations, tools, and verification sources.
top_stories.author: Sarath Krishnan
top_stories.content: The agent-based approach we present is applicable to any type of enterprise content, from product documentation and knowledge bases to marketing materials and technical specifications. To demonstrate these concepts in action, we walk through a practical example of reviewing blog content for technical accuracy. These patterns and techniques can be directly adapted to various content review needs by adjusting the agent configurations, tools, and verification sources.

top_stories.title: GPT-5 lowers the cost of cell-free protein synthesis
top_stories.description: An autonomous lab combining OpenAI’s GPT-5 with Ginkgo Bioworks’ cloud automation cut cell-free protein synthesis costs by 40% through closed-loop experimentation.
top_stories.content: An autonomous lab combining OpenAI’s GPT-5 with Ginkgo Bioworks’ cloud automation cut cell-free protein synthesis costs by 40% through closed-loop experimentation.

top_stories.title: Accelerate agentic application development with a full-stack starter template for Amazon Bedrock AgentCore
top_stories.description: In this post, you will learn how to deploy Fullstack AgentCore Solution Template (FAST) to your Amazon Web Services (AWS) account, understand its architecture, and see how to extend it for your requirements. You will learn how to build your own agent while FAST handles authentication, infrastructure as code (IaC), deployment pipelines, and service integration.
top_stories.author: David Kaleko
top_stories.content: In this post, you will learn how to deploy Fullstack AgentCore Solution Template (FAST) to your Amazon Web Services (AWS) account, understand its architecture, and see how to extend it for your requirements. You will learn how to build your own agent while FAST handles authentication, infrastructure as code (IaC), deployment pipelines, and service integration.

top_stories.title: Precision for Medicine Expands Globally with Singapore Office Opening
top_stories.description: Singapore Office Expands APAC Presence to Seven Locations, Delivering Enhanced Local Expertise and Global Scale Precision for Medicine (Precision), a global leader in biomarker-driven clinical research and development, has announced the opening of a new office in Singapore. This strategic expansion strengthens Precision’s significant presence across the Asia-Pacific (APAC) region,... The post Precision for Medicine Expands Globally with Singapore Office Opening first appeared on AI-Tech Park.
